CatDescriptText: Portion of potential related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 27, 1950, pg. 25, reads: "...Now gang, don't forget the Kolesque Balloon Ball, May 27 at the North Side Elks. Pete Henderson and Combo will be playing smooth music, so put this on your date list..."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of two young women and two young men holding balloons, including Irvin Biggs on right wearing moustache and light colored pinstriped double breasted suit, gathered in North Side Elks lodge decorated with twisted crepe paper streamers and PH music stands, possibly for Kolesque Club "Balloon Ball"
